item.title: Getting started with mvvmcross
item.description: What’s mvvmcross # Mvvmcross is an open source MVVM platform that comes to solve our problems while developing cross platform applications (such as Android, Windows Phone, IOS, etc…). The main problem is, that every platform has its own specifics, but the business logic of your application is likely to be the same on each platform. For instance, if you develop your application for Android and Windows Desktop - your mobile project will have a vibration API while desktop will not.
